argument.description: Specifies the XML namespace declarations that are the result of the XMLNAMESPACES declaration.

description: The XMLFOREST function returns an XML value that is a sequence of XQuery element nodes.
sample: XMLFOREST(xmlnamespaces-declaration, arg1 AS name1, arg2 AS name2 ...)
